alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 25 at 11:07AM MST until February 25 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave, Northwest Deserts and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, Cadiz Basin and San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds will make driving difficult for motorcycles...large trucks...trailers and campers. These winds will create very choppy waters and generate large waves which could capsize or swamp small craft.
info.instruction: Secure outdoor objects. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Boaters are urged to avoid the open water and stay close to shore or in protected coves and inlets.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts
